featuredDevices.title: Featured Devices

scan3dTexu630w.title: Scan3D Texu 630W
scan3dTexu630w.description: High-precision 3D scanner with 630W power, ideal for large-scale industrial scanning applications

scan3dTexu3w.title: Scan3D Texu 3W

scan3dTexuT22.title: Scan3D Texu T22

cta.title: Ready to elevate manufacturing?

orangRhinoSection.title: Orang-Rhino & Ant3D
orangRhinoSection.subtitle: Professional Footwear Design
orangRhinoSection.description: Industry-leading plugin for Rhinoceros 3D, specifically designed for footwear sole design. Create complex sole patterns, multi-layer structures, and precision-engineered components.

hero.title: VoxelDance Manufacturing
hero.subtitle: Powerful build preparation software for additive manufacturing

about.title: About VoxelDance Manufacturing
about.description: VoxelDance Manufacturing is a powerful 3D printing build preparation software for popular 3D printing applications such as prototypes, shoe molds, dental polymer/metal, jewelry, healthcare, education, industrial molds, consumer products, etc. It is compatible with LPBF, SLA, DLP and SLS 3D printing technologies. Thanks to the optimized VDK geometry engine and highly streamlined workflow, users can quickly achieve 3D printing build preparation and production efficiency, and the printing success rate has been significantly improved.

importFormats.title: Just import all the formats.
importFormats.description: Supports nearly all the file formats, bridges the gap between CAD files and 3D printers. Seamlessly import from any CAD software and export to your 3D printer.

repair.title: Repairing files was never so easy.
repair.description: Provides you powerful fix tools to create water-tight data and achieve perfect printing.
repair.autoRepair: Automatically repair files just with one click

orientation.title: Powerful Orientation Tools
orientation.description: Unique orientation for dental printing. Just with one click, all of the crown cups face in an upright position automatically. This reduces manual operation and greatly improves process efficiency and quality assurance.

nesting.title: Nest Your Parts in 2D/3D Automatically and Fast.
nesting.description: VoxelDance Manufacturing not only can complete 2D/3D nesting placement quickly, it also provides multiple placement options. These options include X/Y-axis orientation, blade direction, and platform layout alignment.

supports.title: Multiple Supports for SLA, LPBF and DLP.
supports.description: VoxelDance Manufacturing provides you powerful support types that are compatible with DLP, SLA, and LPBF technologies.

hatches.title: Enhance Your Slice Files with Hatches
hatches.description: VoxelDance Manufacturing could generate slices and add hatches with one click. Export slice file as multiple format, including CLI, SLC, PNG, SVG etc. Its integrated visualization interface allows you to check slices and hatches conveniently.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Experience the power of VoxelDance Manufacturing for your additive manufacturing workflow

hero.title: Easy pattern making, on top of Rhino.
hero.subtitle: Create and modify patterns with ease and efficiency. Jevero integrates seamlessly with Rhino and adds powerful parametric tools that enable a smooth pattern development process.

description.text: Jevero plugin makes pattern engineering smooth and reliable, with quick, intuitive grading and post processing features. Output patterns for most cutting machines and plotters. Jevero's advanced features also include automatic nesting, fabric utilization optimization, and easy-to-use marker making tools, making the production process even more efficient and cost-effective.

robustGrading.title: Robust grading
robustGrading.description: With Jevero you can visualize your designs and make precise pattern adjustments, ensuring a perfect fit for your shoes. With a user-friendly interface that incorporates familiar tools, allowing those with experience in other shoe CAD software to easily adapt and feel at home when working with Jevero.

fitsPipeline.title: Fits to your pipeline
fitsPipeline.description: We support all the major file extensions on the market. We also have invested to be able to support Crispin Engineer .shoe and .pat files. To support your legacy, to have a quicker transition to our tool.

supportedByManufacturers.title: Supported by major cutting machine manufacturers and post-processing tools
supportedByManufacturers.description: With compatibility for formats such as DXF, PLT, HPGL, L2N, and more, Jevero provides a professional and seamless integration with various systems in the footwear industry.

worldOfTools.title: A world of tools: design, prototype, product
worldOfTools.description: We support all the usual workflows and the most advanced one. From the creation of the patterns to the grading, review and production preparation, from one prototyping to final mass production.

parametricPatterns.title: Parametric patterns
parametricPatterns.description: Create pattern with dependencies that automatically track your changes across the model.

grading.title: Grading
grading.description: Create the sample size and automatically grade to all the sizes, use grading centers and groups to precisely control the changes across sizes.

partManagement.title: Part management
partManagement.description: Each pattern will be structured into parts that represent a singular assembly unit for the construction of the shoe. Organize your parts and easily assign them properties.

dataExport.title: Data export
dataExport.description: Export all the created parts to your cutting tables. Jevero support a variety of diverse export format for all the needs.

preciseMeasurements.title: Precise measurements
preciseMeasurements.description: Jevero offers many tools to measure each part of the shoe, whether it is in the sample size or across the grading.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Create processing sheets for each part to instruct the workforce. Skiving, stitching or any other important step can be documented.

layering.title: Layering
layering.description: Compute the amount of material that each shoe uses, easily estimate the custom and duties that you will have to pay for exports.

dxfRebuilding.title: DXF rebuilding
dxfRebuilding.description: Import old models and easily bring them up to speed into Jevero with the rebuilding feature.

cta.title: Contact us to bring your footwear process into the future with
cta.subtitle: The FOOTWEARkit for Rhino

hero.title: Virtual prototypes as fast as possible
hero.subtitle: Botcha is the ultimate 3D footwear tool, offering an intuitive user interface built on Rhinoceros. Discover all the features and preset that will speed up your modelling process.

remapping.title: Remapping and UV Editing
remapping.description: Botcha's UV tools allow for quick flattening, texture manipulations and material simulation. Precise unwrapping that minimize the distortion and automated chart layout that preserve the correct sizing with your 3D model.

tooling.title: Tooling digital textures
tooling.description: Appling displacement textures to toolings and molded parts has never been so easy. Botcha tooling texture manager can handle textures from preview quality to production ready files. Export and clean your toolings directly for laser engravings or 3D printing.

lacing.title: Last, lacing and stitching presets
lacing.description: Botcha offers presets to quickly add laces and stitching to 3D shoe models, saving time and effort. You can also create a custom library of patterns, ensuring flexibility and precision for tailored designs.

grasshopper.title: Grasshopper Nodes
grasshopper.description: Use Grasshopper with Botcha to enhance automation and customization in your footwear design process. Create parametric models and automate repetitive tasks, enabling seamless adjustments and increasing efficiency.

uvUnwrap.title: UV Unwrap
uvUnwrap.description: Generate a 2D version of the 3D object minimizing the stretch of the original mesh. The 2D version will be stored within the object as a texture mapping channel.

drawOnMesh.title: Draw on mesh
drawOnMesh.description: Easily draw a curve laying on a mesh, simply selecting the mesh and choosing the points you want the curve to go through.

uvTransfer.title: UV Transfer
uvTransfer.description: Texturing is a crucial step in creating realistic 3D models. With the UV Tranfer tool, you can ensure your textures are always perfectly aligned.

changeLast.title: Change Last
changeLast.description: Moves planar curves from a flatten last to another one and generates two meshes with the same topology for the source and target last curves respectively.

remapObject.title: Remap object
remapObject.description: This functionality allows an object to be modeled in an advantageous condition (e.g. on a 2D plane) and remapped onto another 3D surface.

flattenLast.title: Flatten Last
flattenLast.description: Flatten the last and add its boundary to the document as a curve and simplifies the pattern engineers' workflow.

projectMesh.title: Project Mesh
projectMesh.description: Projects a mesh onto one or more other meshes. It is useful, for example, to "stick" objects like logos to the shoe.

softEdit.title: Soft Edit
softEdit.description: Change a mesh by applying a transformation proportionally to neighbors of the selected vertices.

cta.title: Contact us to bring your footwear process into the future with
cta.subtitle: The FOOTWEARkit for Rhino

hero.title: ShrinkWrap
hero.subtitle: Create watertight meshes from any geometry with unprecedented ease

overview.title: What is ShrinkWrap?
overview.description: ShrinkWrap creates clean, watertight meshes from any input geometry. It is ideal for 3D printing, manufacturing workflows, and preparing complex models by wrapping them into a solid, manifold mesh.

watertight.title: Watertight meshes
watertight.desc: Generate closed, manifold meshes that pass 3D print checks.

combine.title: Combine complex sets
combine.desc: Unify multiple parts into a single shell without manual booleans.

scanData.title: Scan data cleanup
scanData.desc: Wrap noisy scans/point-cloud derived data into clean surfaces.

robust.title: Robust on mixed inputs
robust.desc: Works with NURBS, SubD, meshes, and mixed model types.

parameters.title: Parameter control
parameters.desc: Adjust offset, target detail, and gap filling behavior.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing ready
manufacturing.desc: Produce shells suitable for downstream CAM and printing.

workflow.title: Suggested workflow
steps: Prepare your input: select geometry (NURBS/SubD/mesh) you want to wrap
Run ShrinkWrap and choose an offset if you need clearance
Set target detail for the mesh quality and processing time trade-off
Fill holes and small gaps to ensure a closed, watertight shell
Validate: run mesh checks or slice a test to confirm print readiness

detail.title: Balance detail vs speed
detail.desc: Use moderate target detail first; increase only if needed.

offset.title: Offset for tolerance
offset.desc: Positive offset adds clearance; 0 keeps the shell tight.

clean.title: Pre-clean inputs
clean.desc: Delete stray parts or extreme outliers before wrapping.

thickness.title: Check for thin regions
thickness.desc: Ensure minimum wall thickness for your printer and material.

hero.tagline: The professional All-in-One build preparation software solutions for leaders and future leaders willing to innovate and succeed.

hero.title: New in Rhino 8
hero.subtitle: Rhino 8 brings new modeling tools like ShrinkWrap, a huge speed boost for Mac users, SubD Creases, PushPull workflows, better drafting tools, a more customizable User Interface, a faster Render engine, new Grasshopper data types, and much more.

overview.title: New in Rhino 8
overview.description: Rhino 8 brings new modeling tools like ShrinkWrap, a huge speed boost for Mac users, SubD Creases, PushPull workflows, better drafting tools, a more customizable User Interface, a faster Render engine, new Grasshopper data types, and much more.

shrinkwrap.title: ShrinkWrap
shrinkwrap.subtitle: Turn Garbage To Gold
shrinkwrap.description: ShrinkWrap creates a watertight mesh around open or closed meshes, NURBS geometry, SubD, and point clouds: ideal for creating meshes for 3D printing.

mac.title: Built for Mac
mac.subtitle: Metal
mac.description: Rhino for Mac is faster than ever, running natively on both Apple Silicon and Intel Macs, and using the Apple Metal display technology.

subd.title: SubD Creases
subd.description: SubD Creases create a feature between a smooth and a sharp edge, without adding complexity to the SubD control net, great for making fillet-like features.

modeling.title: Modeling: Simplified
modeling.description: Rhino 8 unlocks new modeling workflows — like PushPull — and adds intuitive new features to the Gumball, Automatic CPlanes, and more.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Discover the powerful features of Rhinoceros 8

videos.title: Videos & Demo
videos.description: Watch tutorials and demonstrations of Rhinoceros 8

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.description: What our customers say about Rhinoceros 8

shrinkwrap.title: ShrinkWrap: Turn Garbage To Gold
shrinkwrap.description: ShrinkWrap creates a watertight mesh around open or closed meshes, NURBS geometry, SubD, and point clouds. It is ideal for creating meshes for 3D printing, solid union meshes from multiple objects, and valid closed meshes from broken or often hard-to-repair geometry.
features: A solid union mesh from multiple objects
A solid mesh from 3D scan data fragments
Meshes from point clouds when reverse engineering
Valid closed meshes from broken geometry

subdCreases.title: SubD Creases
subdCreases.description: SubD Creases create a feature between a smooth and a sharp edge, without adding complexity to the SubD control net. This allows for accurate, organic modeling that is editable and highly accurate, combining free-form accuracy with quick editing.
features: Weighted edges for smooth to sharp transitions
Push and pull to explore complex shapes

macMetal.title: Built for Mac: Metal
macMetal.description: Rhino for Mac is now faster than ever on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs. Powered by Metal, our new display pipeline delivers hardware-accelerated graphics for high frame rates and large resolutions, even in complex, detailed models.
features: High frame rates and large resolutions
Fluid pan, zoom, and orbit in complex models
Cycles Render Engine built on Metal
Universal App for Intel and Apple Silicon

modelingSimplified.title: Modeling: Simplified
modelingSimplified.description: Rhino 8 adds new features to make modeling more playful and accessible. Combining tools like PushPull, Gumball, and Auto CPlanes reduces friction for common solid creation and editing tasks, allowing you to stay in a single Perspective view.

hero.title: Orang-Rhino & Ant3D
hero.subtitle: Advanced Sole Design
hero.description: Professional-grade plugin for Rhinoceros 3D, specifically designed for footwear sole design. Create complex sole patterns, multi-layer structures, and precision-engineered footwear components with industry-leading tools.

overview.title: Professional Footwear Design
overview.description: Orang-Rhino & Ant3D is the industry-leading plugin for Rhinoceros 3D, specifically designed for footwear sole design. Create complex sole patterns, multi-layer structures, and precision-engineered components with professional-grade tools.

orang.title: Orang Shoe Design Software
orang.description1: Orang is a professional and efficient shoe design software. 3D modeling has become an indispensable part of the shoe design process in recent years. It enables designers and developers to create various new models, visualize designs with greater accuracy, efficiency, and innovation.
orang.description2: Orang is a plugin that works integrated with Rhinoceros and is entirely dedicated to the footwear industry. With a focus on productivity, Orang's tools can reduce the production cycle time by up to

ant3d.description2: Deep design solution for the footwear industry with advanced 3D technology, helping to optimize the footwear design and manufacturing process from concept to final product.

hero.title: RhinoCAM
hero.subtitle: CAM Software Plugin integrated directly inside Rhinoceros 3D CAD software
hero.description: RhinoCAM is a powerful CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) plugin built specifically for Rhino 3D, designed to help CNC programmers, machinists, and engineers generate accurate toolpaths directly within their Rhino workflow. Supports machining from 2-axis to 5-axis with full professional features.

whatIs.title: What is RhinoCAM?
whatIs.description: RhinoCAM is a powerful CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) plugin built specifically for Rhino 3D, designed to help CNC programmers, machinists, and engineers generate accurate toolpaths directly within their Rhino workflow. It supports toolpath creation from 2-axis to 5-axis (2½, 3, 4, and 5-axis), simulation, and post-processing, all inside Rhino's modeling environment.
features: Ideal for professionals working on complex 3D parts and freeform geometry
whatIs.modules: RhinoCAM includes modules for MILL, TURN, NEST & ART

whatDoes.title: What Does RhinoCAM Do?
whatDoes.description: RhinoCAM brings advanced manufacturing capabilities directly into Rhino. Without switching between programs, users can:
capabilities: Generate toolpaths for 2½, 3, 4, and 5-axis CNC machining
Simulate tool movements to detect collisions or errors before cutting
Post-process created toolpaths to generate machine-ready G-code for a wide range of CNC machines/controllers
Adjust operations dynamically: RhinoCAM is fully associative to geometry changes in Rhino
whatDoes.idealFor: This makes RhinoCAM ideal for rapid prototyping, production machining, and advanced manufacturing in industries like mold-making, woodworking, aerospace, and custom fabrication.

mill.name: RhinoCAM – MILL
mill.description: Full-featured milling module for 2½, 3, 4, and 5-axis machining

turn.name: RhinoCAM – TURN
turn.description: Turning module for rotary axis machining and cylindrical parts

nest.name: RhinoCAM – NEST
nest.description: Parts nesting module to optimize material utilization

art.name: RhinoCAM – ART
art.description: Artistic module for creating 3D models from bitmap images

configurations.title: Configurations
configurations.description: RhinoCAM CAM software comes in 5 different configurations to suit the varied machining needs of our customers.

xpr.name: RhinoCAM Xpress (XPR)
xpr.description: General purpose program tailored for hobbyists, makers and students. Ideal for getting started with CAM programming. Includes 2 & 3 axis machining methods.
xpr.for: Perfect for educators, CNC beginners, and makers working on small-scale prototypes and desktop machines.

std.name: RhinoCAM Standard (STD)
std.description: General purpose machining program targeted at the general machinist. Ideal for rapid-prototyping, hobby and educational markets.
features: TURN, NEST and ART included free
std.for: Ideal for general machinists and prototyping workshops focused on ease of use and rapid results. Suited for production machining.

exp.name: RhinoCAM Expert (EXP)
exp.description: This configuration allows 4th Axis Indexed and continuous roughing and finishing operations. Includes all functionality from STD configuration.
features: TURN, NEST and ART included free
exp.for: Suited for experienced machinists and shops needing to perform complex 4-axis indexing and continuous machining, such as those in wood working or custom furniture industries.

pro.name: RhinoCAM Professional (PRO)
pro.description: Powerful package ideal for mold, die and tooling, wood working rapid-prototyping and general machining markets.
features: TURN, NEST and ART included free
pro.for: Designed for advanced manufacturing users in mold making, tooling, and woodworking who require sophisticated toolpath control and precision.

pre.name: RhinoCAM Premium (PRE)
pre.description: This package includes 5 Axis continuous machining functionality. Suitable for highly sophisticated machining requirements.
pre.for: Built for aerospace, advanced mold-making, and specialized woodworking professionals who need the highest level of continuous 5-axis control and advanced machining methods.

items.question: What is RhinoCAM?
items.answer: RhinoCAM is an advanced CAM software plugin that operates directly inside of Rhinoceros (Windows only). It is used by CNC programmers and machinists to generate multi-axis toolpaths, perform machining simulations, and create G-code for CNC machines.

items.question: What type of machining does RhinoCAM support?
items.answer: RhinoCAM supports a wide range of machining operations, including 2½, 3, 4, and 5-axis milling, as well as turning and nesting. It is a comprehensive solution for various CNC manufacturing needs.

items.question: Is RhinoCAM an independent software?
items.answer: No, RhinoCAM is a plugin that requires a licensed installation of Rhinoceros to run. Its seamless integration means it uses the native Rhino environment, making the workflow intuitive for existing Rhino users.

items.question: How does RhinoCAM compare to other CAM software?
items.answer: RhinoCAM is known for its deep integration with the Rhino 3D modeling environment, which provides a seamless workflow and associativity to model changes. Its comprehensive set of features, from 2½ to 5-axis machining, and a wide selection of post-processors make it a powerful and cost-effective choice for professionals who already use Rhino.

items.question: What types of CNC machines does RhinoCAM support?
items.answer: RhinoCAM includes a wide library of post-processors and supports machines that require G-code, including 3-axis mills, 4-axis rotary tables, and full 5-axis machines.

contact.title: 3C CNC Software
contact.subtitle: Authorized distributor of RhinoCAM software in Vietnam

officialLink.text: Learn more about RhinoCAM at the official website:

hero.title: RhinoCAM – MILL
hero.subtitle: CNC milling plugin for Rhino 3D
hero.description: RhinoCAM-MILL is a CNC milling plugin for Rhino 3D and one of the five modules in the RhinoCAM CAM software suite. It's designed for CNC programmers, machinists, and engineers who need precise 2½, 3, 4, and full 5-axis machining directly inside Rhino.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Powered by the VisualMILL CAM engine, this multi-axis CAM software combines Rhino's freeform modeling capabilities with advanced toolpath creation, simulation, and post-processing.
features: Hundreds of free post-processors plus a custom post-processor generator

whatDoes.title: What Does RhinoCAM-MILL Do?
whatDoes.description: RhinoCAM-MILL equips manufacturers with the tools to:
capabilities: Create precision toolpaths for 2½-axis to 5-axis CNC milling
Simulate operations to detect collisions and optimize cutting strategies
Generate machine-ready G-code for a wide range of CNC controllers
Allows machining automation through scripts, Knowledge Bases and API

applications.title: Applications
items: General machining for metal, plastic, or composite parts

features.name: Standard Tools (Ball, Flat, C Rad., Vee, Drill)

items.question: Does RhinoCAM-MILL come with RhinoCAM?
items.answer: Yes, RhinoCAM-MILL is one of the core modules in the RhinoCAM suite. You can purchase it individually or as part of a bundled configuration.

items.question: What kinds of CNC milling machines can I use with RhinoCAM-MILL?
items.answer: It works with a wide range of machines, from standard 3-axis mills to advanced 5-axis machining centers. You'll also get hundreds of ready-to-use post-processors for popular machine brands.

items.question: Is training or technical support included with RhinoCAM-MILL?
items.answer: Yes. MecSoft provides documentation, tutorials, and support resources to help you get started quickly. Training options are also available for teams who want to accelerate adoption.

items.question: Can I customize post-processors for my CNC machine?
items.answer: Absolutely. In addition to the included library, RhinoCAM-MILL comes with a post-processor generator so you can create outputs tailored to your specific machine and controller. We also offer a post-processor writing service to handle complex post-processing requirements.

items.question: Does RhinoCAM-MILL run on Mac computers?
items.answer: No, it's designed for Rhino 8 on Windows only.

hero.title: RhinoCAM-Turn
hero.subtitle: CNC turning plugin for Rhino 3D
hero.description: RhinoCAM-TURN is a CNC turning plugin for Rhino 3D and one of the five modules in the RhinoCAM CAM software suite. It's designed for CNC programmers, machinists, and engineers who need precise 2-axis turning operations directly inside Rhino.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: By keeping the entire process within the Rhino environment, it simplifies programming, reduces back-and-forth between software, and supports greater efficiency in production. Powered by the VisualMILL CAM engine, this module provides everything required to program, simulate, and output turning toolpaths for lathes and turning centers.
features: Included in RhinoCAM Standard, Expert, Professional, and Premium configurations

whatDoes.title: What Does RhinoCAM-TURN Do?
whatDoes.description: RhinoCAM-TURN enables you to create efficient, accurate turning operations without leaving the Rhino environment. You can:
capabilities: Program roughing and finishing passes for external and internal profiles
Create grooves, threads, and parting operations
Perform hole machining on turned parts
Output machine-ready G-code using included or custom post-processors
Hundreds of free post-processors for common CNC lathes
Fully associative with Rhino geometry changes

applications.title: Applications
items: Prototyping and production runs on CNC lathes

features.name: Drag and drop operations from Knowledge Base

items.question: Is RhinoCAM-TURN a standalone product?
items.answer: No. RhinoCAM-TURN is a module within the RhinoCAM suite and is included in the Standard, Expert, Professional, and Premium configurations.

items.question: What types of CNC lathes can I use with RhinoCAM-TURN?
items.answer: It supports a wide range of 2-axis CNC lathes and turning centers from most leading machine tool manufacturers.

items.question: Can I customize post-processors for my turning machine?
items.answer: Absolutely. In addition to the built-in library, RhinoCAM-TURN includes a post-processor generator for creating outputs specific to your machine and controller.

items.question: Can I try RhinoCAM-TURN before buying it?
items.answer: Yes. You can request a demo version to explore its turning capabilities before making a purchase.

items.question: How is RhinoCAM-TURN different from other turning CAM software?
items.answer: RhinoCAM-TURN is fully integrated into Rhino 3D, allowing users to program, simulate, and generate G-code without switching between CAD and CAM platforms. This seamless workflow saves time and reduces errors compared to using standalone CAM applications.

hero.title: RhinoCAM – NEST
hero.subtitle: Efficient parts nesting and layout solution
hero.description: RhinoCAM-NEST provides a cost-effective solution for nesting and arranging geometric shapes onto material sheets, including both rectangular and true shape nesting.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Parts nesting module optimized to maximize material utilization and reduce waste.
features: Support for multiple sheets and parts

whatDoes.title: What Does RhinoCAM-NEST Do?
capabilities: Nest 2D and 3D parts onto material sheets
Optimize material usage
Reduce material waste
Create optimal layouts for machining

features.name: Distance limits between part and sheet
Distance limits between two adjacent parts
Distance limits between part and part
Estimation of # of sheets needed for nest

items.question: Does RhinoCAM-NEST come with RhinoCAM?
items.answer: Yes, RhinoCAM-NEST is included free in all RhinoCAM configurations.

items.question: How many parts can I nest?
items.answer: RhinoCAM-NEST supports unlimited number of parts and can handle multiple material sheets at once.

hero.title: RhinoCAM – ART
hero.subtitle: Convert artwork into machinable geometry
hero.description: RhinoCAM-ART converts artwork into geometry suitable for machining, used to model artistic shapes from raster images, extending the capabilities of the machining module.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Powerful artistic module that allows creating 3D models from bitmap images and converting them into machinable geometry.

whatDoes.title: What Does RhinoCAM-ART Do?
capabilities: Create 3D relief from bitmap image files
Ability to limit creation of reliefs using colors and/or curves
Create puffed up 3D volumes using closed curves
Create 3D sweep volumes using various profiles
Combine 3D volumes using various Boolean operations
Export created 3D volumes as Mesh geometry
Convert 3D CAD geometry to ART 3D volumes
Convert Raster to Vector to create 2D curves

items.name: Create 3D Relief from bitmap image files
Ability to limit creation of reliefs using colors and/or curves
Create puffed up 3D volumes using closed curves
Create 3D sweep volumes using various profiles
Combine 3D volumes using various Boolean operations during creation
Export created 3D volumes as Mesh geometry to CAD system
Convert 3D CAD geometry to ART 3D volumes
Create 2D Curve geometry from image files using Raster to Vector operations
All operations are associative to CAD geometry used in creation
Save and reuse previously created 3D volumes using Shape Library functionality

items.question: Does RhinoCAM-ART come with RhinoCAM?
items.answer: Yes, RhinoCAM-ART is included free in all RhinoCAM configurations.

items.question: What image file types can I use?
items.answer: RhinoCAM-ART supports common bitmap image formats such as BMP, JPG, PNG and others.

hero.title: Scan3D Texu 630W
hero.subtitle: High-Power Industrial 3D Scanner
hero.description: Scan3D Texu 630W is an industrial 3D laser scanner with 630W power, designed for large-scale scanning applications and high precision. Advanced laser technology enables accurate measurement of large objects with fast speed and high resolution.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Scan3D Texu 630W is a professional 3D scanning solution with 630W laser power, suitable for industrial applications requiring high precision and fast scanning speed. This device is designed to handle large and complex objects with superior performance.

capabilities: 3D scanning of large objects with high accuracy

3D model creation from real objects
Quality inspection and measurement
Reverse engineering
Manufacturing and inspection applications

items.question: What applications is Scan3D Texu 630W suitable for?
items.answer: Scan3D Texu 630W is suitable for industrial applications requiring scanning of large objects with high accuracy, including quality inspection, reverse engineering, measurement, and 3D model creation.

items.question: What is the accuracy of the scanner?
items.answer: Scan3D Texu 630W has an accuracy of ±0.05mm, sufficient to meet precise industrial measurement requirements.

items.question: What size objects can the scanner handle?
items.answer: The scanner can handle objects up to 10m x 10m x 10m, suitable for large-scale scanning applications.

items.question: What features does the included software have?
items.answer: The included Scan3D Studio Professional software provides scan data processing tools, 3D model creation, CAD file export, and measurement analysis.

items.question: Can I receive technical support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide full technical support including training, installation, and maintenance for customers.
